snippet: Stephan El Shaarawy scored one goal and set up another to help Roma beat Fiorentina, 4-1, in a showdown for third place in Italy’s Serie A and the final Champions League berth.
abstract: Roma beats Fiorentina, 4-1, securing third place in Italy’s Serie A and final Champions League berth.
lead_paragraph: Stephan El Shaarawy scored one goal and set up another to help Roma beat Fiorentina, 4-1, in a showdown for third place in Italy’s Serie A and the final Champions League berth.
